meanings: put on quite a new aspect

examples.korean: entrust one’s safety to a boat 발음듣기 일신의 안전을 보트에 맡기다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: entrust one’s safety to a boat 발음

examples.korean: The stadium has freshened up the looks with a recent repair. 발음듣기 그 경기장은 최근 보수공사를 통해 면모를 일신했다 Neungyule
examples.english: The stadium has freshened up the looks with a recent repair. 발음

examples.korean: seek safely in flight 발음듣기 달아나서 일신의 안전을 꾀하다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
The tissues of the human body are completely renewed every seven years. 발음듣기 인체의 조직은 7년마다 완전히 일신된다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The tissues of the human body are completely renewed every seven years. 발음

examples.korean: The stadium has freshened up its looks with the recent remodeling. 발음듣기 그 경기장은 최근 보수공사를 통해 면모를 일신했다 Neungyule
examples.english: The stadium has freshened up its looks with the recent remodeling. 발음
